system.description:
At 15th level, your type changes to elemental, your path of transcendence has reached its apex, and you have shed your mortal form. You take on the form of an elemental, becoming made of solid air, earth, fire, water, as appropriate for your element. You no longer need to breathe, drink, eat, or sleep, no longer requiring Supply.

Additionally, you gain an additional ability based on your element.

  • Air: You gain immunity to lightning damage.
  • Earth: You gain immunity to poison damage.
  • Fire: You gain immunity to fire damage.
  • Water: You gain immunity to cold damage.
